code: import axios from"axios";var BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL;var AUTH_API="".concat(BASE_URL,"/auth");var api=axios.create({withCredentials:true});export var signup=function signup(user){return api.post("".concat(AUTH_API,"/signup"),user).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var login=function login(credentials){return api.post("".concat(AUTH_API,"/login"),credentials).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var profile=function profile(){return api.post("".concat(AUTH_API,"/profile")).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var logout=function logout(user){return api.post("".concat(AUTH_API,"/logout"),user).then(function(response){return response.data;});};
